TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Si-poway-Aw-ku-s-tin, title = Si-poway-Aw-ku-s-tin, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Si-poway-Aw-ku-s-tin} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Aw-s-tin "kamu nu La-tin, Augustinus Hipponensis, kamu nu Ing, Augustine of Hippo" anucaay Sa-aw-s-tin kamu Inu nga "Saint Augustine anucaay Saint Austin" angangantu Sen-aw-ku-s-tin. nanu nganga ci Aw-le-liyu. Aw-ku-s-ti-nu-s "kamu nu La-tin "Aurelius Augustinus, 354 a mihca 11 a bulad 13 a demiad katukuh 430 a mihca 8 a bulad 28 a demiad", Low-ma-ti-kow tu sazikuzay a mihcaan Pey-Huy a Pow-pwo-al a tademaw, kasumamadan sitipan tinsikiw a sen-sye-yen, ce-sye-cya, nasutungus tu ta-kungohuy i A-al atu Li-ya a tukay nu An-na-pa ayawan ni Pow-si "Hippo Regius" mikawaway tu kiwkay. 奧斯定(拉丁語:Augustinus Hipponensis；英語:Augustine of Hippo)或聖奧思定(英語:Saint Augustine 或 Saint Austin), ·奧古斯提奴斯(拉丁語:Aurelius Augustinus,354年11月13日—430年8月28日), (Hippo Regius)的主教. nilaculan lecuhan ciniza i Low-ma-ti-kow i Pey-bey a A-bey-li-cya-sin a kuwan nu Ta-cya-s-te-cen, i Low-ma micudad, i Mi-lan misili. nisulitan niza "tasikul ku balucu' lu" pangangan han satipan a naemekan "saayaway" nisulitan tu nikauzipan nu uzip, imahini mahiza maasipay tu. ci Aw-s-tin amikilul tu zuma nilekecanay a nikauzip nu misumad. . mapatay ciniza hawsa tinsikiw kiwkay mapala u sitinenngay a tademaw atu mutesekay aku tineng, pangangan han tu En-cung-pow-s "kamu nu La-ti , Doctor Gratiae" uyni a nipangangan lalekalan ciniza i Pow-la a nasakamu tu kalalaisan, sakay paini nu kamisama a kamu." nika zuma migingkiway tu kamisama caay patatenga' ku sawalian a ciwlu, u lalekalan milawlaway tu nizateng, u patay niza satipanay nu migikiway tu naemekan nu Ow-cow i angilan a hekalan nu kasumamadan a zidayan malingatu. (拉丁語:Doctor Gratiae, . celahcan tu 354 a mihcaan, Ow-ke-s-tin lecuh i saamisan bey nu Ta-cya-s-te-cen "ayza tini i A-al atu Li-ya lalabu nu Su-ke-ay-he-la-s" tu Pow-pow-al a labu nu luma'. u sakakaay a wawa nu luma' ciniza, ngangan a wama ci Pow-te-u-s.he-ciw-la-s "Patricius Herculus" sakakaay nu milisataay nu Low-ma, nacaay ku tinsikiw a sinzya, u makasicay, nayay ku nizateng, asaca matinengay misulup tu balucu' nu tademaw, katuku ayaw nu kapatay kya mikilul tu tinsikiw. nina ci Sen-mu-ni-cya u mikilulay tu tinsikiw, kisabaan tu 25 ku mihcaan. 公元354年, (Patricius Herculus) 25歲. Aw-ku-s-tin caay ku lecuh sanay misili tu a mala u mikeliday tu tinsikiw. 13 ku mihcaan micumud tu Ma-ta-u-la "Madaura" minanam tu syung-pan-su. 17 a mihcaan tayza i Cya-tay-ci minanam tu syu-ce-sye. uyza a mihcaan mapatay ku ama. 17 ku mihcaan u cayay ku sapuenelay ciniza a tatayna maluacawa niza "concubine". 18 ku mihcaan cacay ku nilecuhan a wawa ci A-te-aw-ta-tu "Adeodatus". yu masakapah henay ci Aw-ku-s-tin misabengawbengaw ku tineng, nanginang sa. (Madaura) . tuya 19 ku mihcaan ci Aw-ku-s-tin malilid nu Si-say-loway "Hortensius", malangat tu pilunguc tu tineng atu balucu'ay a nizateng, milayap tu Mu-ni-cyaw a damsay katalay nu al-yen-lun a sinzya. masakapah henay ku mihcaan niza misinzya tu mu-ni-cyaw. ci Aw-ku-s-tin 20 ku mihcaan malepun ku nu Low-ma-ti-kow a nitiyangen tu tulu liked tu pasubana' tu nipicudad, 22 ku mihcaan i Cyw-tay-ci-cwsu mipasumana' tu syung-pan, 26 ku mihcaan misulit tu cacay lun-own "palalecad tu bangcal", 29 ku mihcaan atu Mu-ni-cyaw nu mapalaway tu migingkiway tu kamisama a nizateng, maazih kuyni mapalaway u kamu dada', nayay ku punu', caay ka patubeli tu kaliyuhan. zikuz malilid nu Sin-pow-la-tu a nizateng Pi a tuas Pu-low-ti-nuo miales tu Mu-ni-cya. tuya 30 ku mihcaan, mikilul ci Mi-la-cu-cyaw An-pow-low-siw minanam tu nu tinsikiw a sinzya atu migingkiway tu kamisama, malaliyas tu 10 a mihcaan nikapulung tu masumidang, atu kiadidi'an cinizaan tu 18 ku mihcaan nu limecadan patapang. i pigingkiwan tu canacanan a kiwkayan atu ze-sye zikuz sibalucu' tu tinsikiw. katukuh tu 32 ku mihcaan, nikauzipan sitazikuz tu. 33 ku mihcaan misili. i "tazikuz ku balucu' a nikiluan", patinaku ciniza hicaen ku pidama tu labuay a balucu' niza, balah makelid nu tinsikiw, maemec tu ku baluca'ay a napabaliw a nipabalucu'an micumud tu kelisetu, tawyay u celahcan 38 a mihcaan. i Aw-ku-s-tina a nikauzipan tatusa ku kahenulan a tademaw, matesek ku nikalilid nu nikauzipan niza. 到了32歲, . cacay silusa a miinuli cinizaan tu 31 a mihcaan ku katenesay a waina ci Mu-ni-ka, zuma cacay nu Mi-la a cu-cyaw ci An-pow-low-siw. liliden nu heni ci Aw-ku-s tayza i ciwlu ayawan nu pibaungan, matanusuk ku nikasumad. zuma a demiad, ci Aw-ku-s-tin i Mi-lan a luma'an nu balubaluan misaculiculil, kasikaz pacici a patatiku cinizaan. muawaw ku balucu'ay niza, "ayaan a katukuhan saw? ayza amahica, pahezek ku naayaway nipauning takuwan?" 34 ku mihcaan taluma' i Bey-cow minanam tu nikauzip. 42 ku mihcaan situngus tu nu Pey-bey-si-pow " Hippo" cu-cyaw. 75 ku mihcaan i Wang-ta-al milawp tu Si-pow-cen hawsa mapatay. zayhan sakay ciwlu sinzya izaw ku kahenulan a patizeng tu kilang, pala u kamisama han nu tinsikiw, pangangan sen-Aw-ku-s-tin "Sanctus Aurelius Augustinus". "sesiw.hami malumanay sesiw a cudad" naemekan tu zuma tabaki ku kalilid nu naemekan. u nigingkiwan niza mala zikuz nu ciwlu sinzya nu saayaway a nipasubana', malilid hamin nu sawalin kiwkay, sangaleb sakay satipan a kiwkay u sailabuay.

== kakiliman == Aw-s-tin "kamo no La-tin, Aogostinos Hipponensis, kamo no Ing, Aogostine of Hippo" anocaay Sa-aw-s-tin kamo Ino nga "Saint Aogostine anocaay Saint Aostin" anganganto Sen-aw-ko-s-tin. nano nganga ci Aw-le-liyo. Aw-ko-s-ti-no-s "kamo no La-tin "Aorelios Aogostinos, 354 a mihca 11 a bolad 13 a demiad katokoh 430 a mihca 8 a bolad 28 a demiad", Low-ma-ti-kow to sazikozay a mihcaan Pey-Hoy a Pow-pwo-al a tademaw, kasomamadan sitipan tinsikiw a sen-sye-yen, ce-sye-cya, nasotongos to ta-kongohoy i A-al ato Li-ya a tokay no An-na-pa ayawan ni Pow-si "Hippo Regios" mikawaway to kiwkay. 奧斯定(拉丁語:Aogostinos Hipponensis；英語:Aogostine of Hippo)或聖奧思定(英語:Saint Aogostine 或 Saint Aostin), ·奧古斯提奴斯(拉丁語:Aorelios Aogostinos,354年11月13日—430年8月28日), (Hippo Regios)的主教. nilacolan lecohan ciniza i Low-ma-ti-kow i Pey-bey a A-bey-li-cya-sin a kowan no Ta-cya-s-te-cen, i Low-ma micodad, i Mi-lan misili. nisolitan niza "tasikol ko baloco' lo" pangangan han satipan a naemekan "saayaway" nisolitan to nikaozipan no ozip, imahini mahiza maasipay to. ci Aw-s-tin amikilol to zoma nilekecanay a nikaozip no misomad. . mapatay ciniza hawsa tinsikiw kiwkay mapala o sitinenngay a tademaw ato motesekay ako tineng, pangangan han to En-cong-pow-s "kamo no La-ti , Doctor Gratiae" oyni a nipangangan lalekalan ciniza i Pow-la a nasakamo to kalalaisan, sakay paini no kamisama a kamo." nika zoma migingkiway to kamisama caay patatenga' ko sawalian a ciwlo, o lalekalan milawlaway to nizateng, o patay niza satipanay no migikiway to naemekan no Ow-cow i angilan a hekalan no kasomamadan a zidayan malingato. (拉丁語:Doctor Gratiae, . celahcan to 354 a mihcaan, Ow-ke-s-tin lecoh i saamisan bey no Ta-cya-s-te-cen "ayza tini i A-al ato Li-ya lalabo no So-ke-ay-he-la-s" to Pow-pow-al a labo no loma'. o sakakaay a wawa no loma' ciniza, ngangan a wama ci Pow-te-o-s.he-ciw-la-s "Patricios Hercolos" sakakaay no milisataay no Low-ma, nacaay ko tinsikiw a sinzya, o makasicay, nayay ko nizateng, asaca matinengay misolop to baloco' no tademaw, katoko ayaw no kapatay kya mikilol to tinsikiw. nina ci Sen-mo-ni-cya o mikilolay to tinsikiw, kisabaan to 25 ko mihcaan. 公元354年, (Patricios Hercolos) 25歲. Aw-ko-s-tin caay ko lecoh sanay misili to a mala o mikeliday to tinsikiw. 13 ko mihcaan micomod to Ma-ta-o-la "Madaora" minanam to syong-pan-so. 17 a mihcaan tayza i Cya-tay-ci minanam to syo-ce-sye. oyza a mihcaan mapatay ko ama. 17 ko mihcaan o cayay ko sapoenelay ciniza a tatayna maloacawa niza "concobine". 18 ko mihcaan cacay ko nilecohan a wawa ci A-te-aw-ta-to "Adeodatos". yo masakapah henay ci Aw-ko-s-tin misabengawbengaw ko tineng, nanginang sa. (Madaora) . toya 19 ko mihcaan ci Aw-ko-s-tin malilid no Si-say-loway "Hortensios", malangat to pilongoc to tineng ato baloco'ay a nizateng, milayap to Mo-ni-cyaw a damsay katalay no al-yen-lon a sinzya. masakapah henay ko mihcaan niza misinzya to mo-ni-cyaw. ci Aw-ko-s-tin 20 ko mihcaan malepon ko no Low-ma-ti-kow a nitiyangen to tolo liked to pasobana' to nipicodad, 22 ko mihcaan i Cyw-tay-ci-cwso mipasomana' to syong-pan, 26 ko mihcaan misolit to cacay lon-own "palalecad to bangcal", 29 ko mihcaan ato Mo-ni-cyaw no mapalaway to migingkiway to kamisama a nizateng, maazih koyni mapalaway o kamo dada', nayay ko pono', caay ka patobeli to kaliyohan. zikoz malilid no Sin-pow-la-to a nizateng Pi a toas Po-low-ti-noo miales to Mo-ni-cya. toya 30 ko mihcaan, mikilol ci Mi-la-co-cyaw An-pow-low-siw minanam to no tinsikiw a sinzya ato migingkiway to kamisama, malaliyas to 10 a mihcaan nikapolong to masomidang, ato kiadidi'an cinizaan to 18 ko mihcaan no limecadan patapang. i pigingkiwan to canacanan a kiwkayan ato ze-sye zikoz sibaloco' to tinsikiw. katokoh to 32 ko mihcaan, nikaozipan sitazikoz to. 33 ko mihcaan misili. i "tazikoz ko baloco' a nikiloan", patinako ciniza hicaen ko pidama to laboay a baloco' niza, balah makelid no tinsikiw, maemec to ko baloca'ay a napabaliw a nipabaloco'an micomod to keliseto, tawyay o celahcan 38 a mihcaan. i Aw-ko-s-tina a nikaozipan tatosa ko kahenolan a tademaw, matesek ko nikalilid no nikaozipan niza. 到了32歲, . cacay silosa a miinoli cinizaan to 31 a mihcaan ko katenesay a waina ci Mo-ni-ka, zoma cacay no Mi-la a co-cyaw ci An-pow-low-siw. liliden no heni ci Aw-ko-s tayza i ciwlo ayawan no pibaongan, matanosok ko nikasomad. zoma a demiad, ci Aw-ko-s-tin i Mi-lan a loma'an no balobaloan misacolicolil, kasikaz pacici a patatiko cinizaan. moawaw ko baloco'ay niza, "ayaan a katokohan saw? ayza amahica, pahezek ko naayaway nipaoning takowan?" 34 ko mihcaan taloma' i Bey-cow minanam to nikaozip. 42 ko mihcaan sitongos to no Pey-bey-si-pow " Hippo" co-cyaw. 75 ko mihcaan i Wang-ta-al milawp to Si-pow-cen hawsa mapatay. zayhan sakay ciwlo sinzya izaw ko kahenolan a patizeng to kilang, pala o kamisama han no tinsikiw, pangangan sen-Aw-ko-s-tin "Sanctos Aorelios Aogostinos". "sesiw.hami malomanay sesiw a codad" naemekan to zoma tabaki ko kalilid no naemekan. o nigingkiwan niza mala zikoz no ciwlo sinzya no saayaway a nipasobana', malilid hamin no sawalin kiwkay, sangaleb sakay satipan a kiwkay o sailaboay.
